headline: Once I've gathered all this information, I'll structure it into a CSV format with each field enclosed in double quotes and separated by semicolons. The first row will be the header: "headline"
author: author
content: content. Each subsequent row will represent one article with its respective details.

headline: New Breakthrough in Renewable Energy
author: Dr. Emily Carter
content: Scientists have made a significant discovery in harnessing solar energy more efficiently, promising to reduce global carbon emissions by up to 30% within the next decade.
